strengths: Historic beachfront setting with distinctive character and a more intimate luxury feel
Classic Portuguese styling and elegant interiors create a refined, romantic atmosphere
Strong culinary appeal built around Algarve flavors and fresh seafood

common: Best for travelers seeking a sophisticated coastal stay with historic charm and boutique-style service
Works best when room-category expectations and local activity plans are aligned early

honeymoon: Excellent fit for couples wanting a romantic beachfront setting with elegant design and strong dining
Strong match for travelers prioritizing charm and atmosphere over large-resort programming
multi_gen_family: Selective fit for smaller family groups that value location and comfort over resort-style kids programming
Less ideal for multi-gen families needing extensive on-site activities or large villa inventory
solo_wellness: Good fit for solo wellness travelers seeking spa time and a calm seaside base
Works well for low-key restorative stays paired with coastal walks and light exploration
corporate_executive: Selective fit for executives wanting a refined boutique stay and recovery-oriented downtime
Better for individual or small leadership stays than meeting-heavy programs

seasonality.late_september: Late September is a strong fit for romantic coastal travel in the Algarve, with warm weather and a generally calmer pace than peak summer.
seasonality.peak_summer: Peak Summer brings stronger beach demand and tighter restaurant/activity availability, so advance planning is important.
seasonality.shoulder_apr_may: Shoulder Season can be a strong value window for luxury clients prioritizing scenery, dining, and spa over peak beach energy.
seasonality.low_nov_mar: Low season operations across the Algarve can vary; verify local venue openings and beach/weather expectations before positioning.

risks.text: Clients expecting a large resort footprint and extensive on-site programming may find the boutique scale too limited.
Peak summer room preferences and popular dining slots can tighten quickly without early booking coordination.
Family fit depends on expectations, as the property is stronger on charm and location than activity-heavy programming.
